refnamediv.refpurpose: Get info about given date formatted according to the specified format

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
format
Format accepted by DateTime::createFromFormat.
datetime
String representing the date/time.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns associative array with detailed info about given date/time.

&reftitle.examples;
date_parse_from_format example
<?php $date = "6.1.2009 13:00+01:00"; print_r(date_parse_from_format("j.n.Y H:iP", $date)); ?>
&example.outputs;
Array ( [year] => 2009 [month] => 1 [day] => 6 [hour] => 13 [minute] => 0 [second] => 0 [fraction] => [warning_count] => 0 [warnings] => Array ( )
[error_count] => 0 [errors] => Array ( )
[is_localtime] => 1 [zone_type] => 1 [zone] => 3600 [is_dst] => )
